name: Butterfly
text: Butterflies are insects with large, often brightly colored wings. They belong to the order Lepidoptera and are important pollinators.

name: Ant
text: Ants are social insects that live in colonies. They are known for their strength and complex social organization.

name: Beetle
text: Beetles belong to the order Coleoptera, the largest group of insects. They have hardened forewings and diverse habitats.

name: Dragonfly
text: Dragonflies are fast-flying insects with large multifaceted eyes and two pairs of strong transparent wings.

name: Mosquito
text: Mosquitoes are small, midge-like flies. Some species are vectors of diseases like malaria and dengue.
